author: Kris Maher
title: Bill Cosby’s Defense Searches for Missing Witness, as Sex-Assault Trial Nears End
text:
Bill Cosby’s defense lawyers are struggling to locate a witness they say will help the entertainer discredit his main accuser in a sexual-assault trial that is speeding to conclusion.
Judge Steven O’Neill gave defense attorneys until Monday to find a woman who had been a friend of the accuser, Andrea Constand, when she said Mr. Cosby drugged and assaulted her at his home in a Philadelphia suburb in January 2004.
